name: Prod.fst_intCast
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : AddGroupWithOne α
inst✝ : AddGroupWithOne β
n : Int
⊢ Eq (↑n).1 ↑n
decl:
@[simp]
theorem fst_intCast (n : ℤ) : (n : α × β).fst = n :=
  rfl

name: Prod.snd_intCast
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : AddGroupWithOne α
inst✝ : AddGroupWithOne β
n : Int
⊢ Eq (↑n).2 ↑n
decl:
@[simp]
theorem snd_intCast (n : ℤ) : (n : α × β).snd = n :=
  rfl
